thread.title: Shania Twain gives Toronto fans a night to remember [Photos]
thread.title_full: Shania Twain gives Toronto fans a night to remember [Photos]

title: Shania Twain gives Toronto fans a night to remember [Photos]
text:
Shania Twain gives Toronto fans a night to remember By Jason MacNeil , Special to Postmedia Network First posted: Monday, October 12, 2015 10:46 AM EDT | Updated: Monday, October 12, 2015 10:53 AM EDT Shania - Rock This Country Tour at the ACC 
Shania Twain was hot rockin' at the ACC on her Rock This Country at the ACC in Toronto, Ont. on Sunday October 11, 2015. Jack Boland/Toronto Sun/Postmedia Network Jack Boland/Toronto Sun
